snp4.9:1.1: “Even when I saw Craving, Delight, and Lust,
snp4.9:1.2: I had no desire for sex.
snp4.9:1.3: What is this thing full of piss and shit?
snp4.9:1.4: I wouldn’t even want to touch it with my foot.”
snp4.9:2.1: “If you do not want a gem such as this,
snp4.9:2.2: a lady desired by many rulers of men,
snp4.9:2.3: then what kind of theory, precepts and vows, livelihood,
snp4.9:2.4: and rebirth in a new life do you assert?”
snp4.9:3.3: “none have been adopted thinking, ‘I assert this.’
snp4.9:4.1: “O sage, you speak of judgments you have formed,”
snp4.9:4.3: “without having adopted any of those views.
snp4.9:4.4: As to that matter of ‘inner peace’—
snp4.9:4.5: how is that described by the wise?”

snp4.9:5.3: “oral transmission, notion, and precepts and vows;
